Search.Title: 500 Days of Summer
Search.Actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Zooey Deschanel, Geoffrey Arend, Chloë Grace Moretz
Search.Plot: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.

Search.Title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
Search.Actors: Jennifer Love Hewitt, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, Freddie Prinze Jr.
Search.Plot: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

Search.Title: The Kings of Summer
Search.Actors: Nick Robinson, Gabriel Basso, Moises Arias, Nick Offerman
Search.Plot: Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land.

Search.Title: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
Search.Actors: Yeong-su Oh, Ki-duk Kim, Young-min Kim, Jae-kyeong Seo
Search.Plot: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

Search.Title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
Search.Actors: Jennifer Love Hewitt, Freddie Prinze Jr., Brandy Norwood, Mekhi Phifer
Search.Plot: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who had left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

Search.Title: Last of the Summer Wine
Search.Actors: Peter Sallis, Jane Freeman, Kathy Staff, Robert Fyfe
Search.Plot: Three old men from Yorkshire who have never grown up face the trials of their fellow town citizens and everyday life and stay young by reminiscing about the days of their youth and attempting feats not common to the elderly.

Search.Title: Summer of Rockets
Search.Actors: Toby Stephens, Keeley Hawes, Lily Sacofsky, Linus Roache
Search.Plot: Cold war drama following a Russian Jewish inventor and his family living in Britain.

Search.Title: Saturday Night Live: Weekend Update Summer Edition
Search.Actors: Kenan Thompson, Seth Meyers, Fred Armisen, Bill Hader
Search.Plot: "Saturday Night Live's" satirical news segment expanded into primetime with three pre-election Thursday night specials.

Search.Title: The Long Hot Summer
Search.Writer: William Faulkner (stories), Rita Mae Brown, Dennis Turner
Search.Actors: Don Johnson, Jason Robards, Judith Ivey, Cybill Shepherd
Search.Plot: A loner arrives in a small town only to be condemned for the sins of his father.

Search.Title: Summer Camp Island
Search.Genre: Animation, Short, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy
Search.Actors: Oona Laurence, Elliott Smith, Julia Pott, Sam Lavagnino
Search.Plot: Two best friends go to a magic sleep-away camp, where nothing is what it seems.
